Container.Name: logarr-backend
Container.Overview: Logarr Backend API - A unified logging dashboard for media server stacks. This is the backend API service that handles log ingestion, storage, and real-time streaming via WebSockets. Requires PostgreSQL and Redis.
Container.Description: Logarr Backend API - A unified logging dashboard for media server stacks. This is the backend API service that handles log ingestion, storage, and real-time streaming via WebSockets. Requires PostgreSQL and Redis.

Config.Name: Database URL
Config.Description: PostgreSQL connection string. Use container name 'logarr-db' if using the Logarr PostgreSQL container.

Config.Name: Redis URL
Config.Description: Redis connection string. Use container name 'logarr-redis' if using the Logarr Redis container.

Config.Name: CORS Origin
Config.Description: Frontend URL for CORS. Example: http://192.168.1.100:3001 - Set to your Logarr frontend URL.

Config.Name: Backend Port
Config.Description: Internal port the backend listens on

Config.Name: Log Files Path
Config.Description: Path to log files you want to ingest. Mount your application log directories here.
